ValidationServiceImpl - Class in org.thewhitemage13.service
Implementation of the ValidationServiceInterface that provides validation services for checking the existence of a user and a post before creating or updating a comment.
ValidationServiceImpl(PostClient, UserClient) - Constructor for class org.thewhitemage13.service.ValidationServiceImpl
Constructs a new ValidationServiceImpl with the specified PostClient and UserClient.
ValidationServiceInterface - Interface in org.thewhitemage13.interfaces
Defines the contract for validation services in the application.
verifyUserExistence(Long) - Method in interface org.thewhitemage13.clients.UserClient
Verifies the existence of a user by their unique identifier.
